EmailTemplate.name: Green Tech Info
EmailTemplate.subject: Green Tech Info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom.
The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) is currently offering the Green Technology Pilot Program for inventions that improve environmental quality, increase energy conservation, assist in the development of renewable energy resources, reduce greenhouse gas emissions or provide some other benefit to the environment. If an application is accepted by the USPTO for the Pilot Program, it could be examined in far less time than non-qualifying applications, saving you anywhere from a few months to a year or even more.
For more information about this program or to download the application form, please visit: http://www.legalzoom.com/patents-green-tech-program.html
If you have any other questions, simply reply to this email or contact our customer care team at (800) 773-0888 Monday-Friday from 6 a.m.-7 p.m. PT.
Best Regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
